Key Match Events: Luka Doncic scored 32 points for the Mavericks
Dereck Lively II, Kyrie Irving and Daniel Gafford all notched double-figures in support
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley said, "It sucks. There’s no other way to put it. It sucks for him, the way in which he started this year, the way in which he was playing, the way he’s carrying us in so many ways"
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic announced that All-Star forward Paolo Banchero suffered a torn oblique and will be sidelined indefinitely
Others: The Magic rank 25th in the NBA in scoring
The Mavericks outscored the Magic 52-36 near the rim and brought down 53 rebounds
Franz Wagner paced the Magic offense with 13 points
